comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: "The Soccer football team from the Koln will play the Royal Australian Naval Team at 2 pm on Wednesday in Lyne Park." 2 pm on Wednesday 10/05/1933. Presumably before the match due to the lack of mud! Read all about the visit - SMH 8/05/1933 p.11 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16966131. There is a Captain Schniewind mentioned; I wonder if he is in this photo?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks again Beachcomber. I wonder if the German officer middle row, far right could be Schniewind..?
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] I thought that too, but the two stripes and a star on his sleeve indicate Oberleutnant (Sublieutenant), according to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_Navy . I imagine there are more in the series to come. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/7654517508/]

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Serendipitous coincidence - just posted by SLNSW -

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/7633410814/]

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] I think it might be sport on the brain at the moment, for some reason... :) I just found some S J Hood pics of the KOLN crew, I will post in the next couple of days. Stay tuned & thanks again!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32842300@N06
comment._content:
Captain of the HSK Kormorran (Theodore Detmers) is in this pick he was one of the officers on board the Koln when she visited Aust prewar. 
His in the second row far right holding gloves wearing a marine uniform. 

Stephen.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32842300@N06] Good spotting! Wikipedia article on Theodor Detmers (which mentions this visit to Australia in 1933) -

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] An in the Samuel Hood image below of the same visit we see Otto Schniewind - who has a very distinctive face! It doesn't look as though he appears in the photo of the soccer team: www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/7769590278/in/photo...
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32842300@N06] Thanks Stephen! very well spotted. We have updated our collection records to include this information :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
